channel.title: Startup Life on Jiten Agarwal
channel.description: Recent content in Startup Life on Jiten Agarwal

item.title: My Essential Business Tools
item.description: I have been involved in developing a premium spices brand www.justspices.in for over a year now. This is my first stint at developing a business full-time after working as a professional software engineer for 4 years. Developing a business is fun and challenging. You face new challenges every day in execution while making sure you keep growing and find new avenues of revenue (that rhymed!) while keeping your values intact. Since I have been in this thing for a year now, I have developed some workflows that help me handle frequent chores error-free and smoothly.
